The {@LinkCreature:22#7#apprentice witches} are the least dangerous, but the most numerous. If this is a contagion, we have to stop it.

They congregate in the Grand Hall. Kill them and find {@LinkCreature:222#1008#Duani} when you're done."Kill the students?"

Yes, damn you. We'll hire an army of mystics to resurrect them when this is over.

Those clever apprentices will have {@LinkCreature:22#1#angry Mr. Purrfects} and {@LinkCreature:22#2#frisky Mr. Purrfects} protecting them so watch out.

Collect any notes or letters the apprentices have. They may be clues.

Be careful when you tell {@LinkCreature:222#1008#Duani}. She'll take their deaths hard.

You slew children simply to find clues?

We must have answers. I'll look over these letters and see what I can learn.

I understand you're collecting clues and letters?

You are? Excellent. Return when you've finished.
